price: په هغې کې پرېښتې او روح د خپل پالونکي په اجازه د هر (ټاکلي) کار لپاره را کوزيږي.
arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: tanazzalu al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu fīhā bi-idh'ni rabbihim min kulli amrin
